line: rach i told you everything i knew last night
look it is not that big of a deal so monica and chandler are doing it
i cannot believe you would say that
monica and chandler are making love
fine i want i need more details who who initiated the first kiss
they did it right there on the couch
hey gunther can i have a scone please
someone i know is getting married
oh by the by it is my ex wife emily
did they teach you that in your anger management class
hey you know what might help you deal with it
think of it this way you and emily are in the past and you cannot be mad about the past
so are you still mad about the louisiana purchase
pheebs i don’t think anyones mad about that
because it is in the past
look at us all dressed up for the big office party
by the way what are we celebrating
oh we had a lot of liquor left over from the christmas party
i think this is so cool because none of our friends are here and we can be a real couple
we do not have to hide
i know i can do this
ooh and i can do this
wo ho ho who is the pretty lady and what the hell is she doing with you
i asked myself that very question sir
and this is my wife kara
say uh bing did you hear about the new law firm we got working for us
come on honey let us go drink our body weight
oh that was my work laugh
oh believe me to survive this party you are gonna have to come up with one too
says 30 father same as in town
everybody at work loved you last night
they like me more just because i was with ya
i think you repaired a lot of the damage from when they met joey
and doug wants us to play tennis with them
he is never even talked to me outside of work
except for that time when we bumped into each other at that strip club
anyway gonna go try and find a racquet
hey i thought you already had one
oh i used too but then joey thought it would be fun to go to central park and hit rocks at bigger rocks
hey rach do you have a tennis racquet
oh umm yknow i lent it to joey and i never actually got it back
i thought you had to do inventory all day
well yeah i do but i decided to take a long lunch and spend some time with my friend monica
yknow i i feel that we do not talk anymore
oh yknow what we don’t have to talk about work
okay what is going on with you
well i i there was this guy at the bank that i thought was cute umm but i do not anymore
umm yknow what though mon i actually do have a lot of work to do so if if are you sure there is just not anything else
rachel is there something that you want to talk me about
if there was i would not tell you
hey pheebs what is going on
i was up all night writing this really nasty letter to emily
it was perfect and now it is all covered in in actually thanks
everybody ready to go to the movies
uh actually i think gonna skip it
yeah gonna stay and read my book
i just wanna be alone right now
are you sure you do not want to come
tom hanks meg ryan they get mail and stuff
all right let us go pheebs
well i gotta tell ya bing that partner of yours is a real tiger
we are we are just gonna get a little sip of water
am i on fire today or what
those birds are browned basted and ready to be carved
i think we should let them win the next game
sorry i do not understand what you just said
i mean look at um he cannot breath and she is popping pills
you are not even giving them a chance
they have racquets do not they
uh bing i think we are gonna make this the last game
put me out of my misery
are you sure you never played pro
take it down to 95 but that is the best i can do
i cannot believe you let them win
yeah at least you hid your feelings well about it
if we had not lost the game they never would have invented us to dinner tomorrow night
is it is how how different you act around them
i mean yknow the throwing the tennis games the fake laugh the see you around bing
not if i see you first doug
i gotta tell you i do not like work chandler
okay yknow what because you said that not putting out tonight
my brother does not stay out all night
maybe we should check the trash chute
ross could not fit down the trash chute
that is right he almost could
which is exactly how i got stuck there
where the hell have you been
ohh out oh god i do not know why we did not think to check there
i uh went to a bar
and then i just uh just walked around for a while
you walked around all night in the city by yourself
look i do not have to answer your questions
a big boy i can do whatever i want
ross you left you scarf in hey you guys
i know what you all are thinking
no that is what i was thinking
so asking you please take a moment before you judge me
you mister right place at the right time call me
okay look i i know what you guys are going to say
you two will have very hairy children
okay i did not know you would say that
look i did not lose my mind
okay janice and i have a lot in common
we have we have both been divorced
so are you actually gonna see her again
do not put ideas in his head
i am gonna see her again
okay i have to tell you something that i have never admitted during our entire friendship
but when we were in high school i made out with james farrell even when i knew that you liked him
wow that feels so good to get off my chest
what what are you talking about
ugh monica i know about you and chandler
i overheard you guys on the phone the other day and you said just tell rachel that doing laundry for a couple of hours
you know what your nickname is mr
sounds like you are writing yourself a little play there rach
let me know how that one turns out
well i would not know because i got so freaked out that i hung up the phone
well if you had kept listening you you would have heard me call him mr
he tells the most racist jokes
so you are telling me that there is nothing going on between you and chandler
all right put your 20 bucks down
first one to find the tasty treat wins
let us get the contestants out of their isolation booths
get your foot off my contestant
it sounds so weird to say this but i just had a great day with janice
i opened up to her about all the terrible stuff that is been happening to me
i mean i talked for hours
it is amazing to have someone give you such such focused attention
you do not need janice for that you have got us
and the duck gets the nutter butter
hey hey that is not a nutter butter that is just an old wonton
but seriously i believe that we should all support president clinton
so how do you kids like your coffee
just a little bit of sugar
well maybe bring it out and have monica stick her finger in it
that oughta sweeten it up huh
how does that laugh not give you a headache
oh you get used to it
yknow i i i do not think that i can
so if you do not mind maybe this will be it for me on the work things
so i laugh at my bosss jokes what is the big deal
rather hang out with a sniveling work weasel guy when i can be hanging out with my boyfriend who i actually respect
uh i gotta apologize for karas coffee
yknow i feel sorry for it if it ever got in a fight it is not strong enough to defend itself
did you hear what i said bing
what is the matter with you
well i i just did not think it was funny sir
honey i just do not think that you understood the joke
i mean it was really funny i i just do not think you got it
you see karas coffee is is is weak tasting okay
but but what doug was was imply that it was weak physically
i thought you could use the help
hey you mind if i read my comic books in here
oh well chandler and monica are over there and it is kinda hard to concentrate
she just called and said that she was gonna be working late
just gonna go over there and confront them right now
all right so you are telling me that i have to tell racist jokes now
just not very good at this
a terrible liar and i hate having to lie to rachel
but we are not ready to tell yet
it is just that ever since high school rachel was the one person i told everything too
i miss that so much now
wh wh what are you doing here
she tries to pull her shirt down to cover the fact that she is wearing mens boxers
well i was actually i i came over here to to borrow this lamp
to umm look at my books yknow see them a little better
umm well what what i was doing in chandlers room is that umm i was cleaning it
in fact he pays me to clean it
what a great way to earn some extra pocket money
yknow when i said to you earlier that i was at work umm at my new work
okay well umm gonna go look at my books
get back to my new job
because i can stay out as late as you want
i told you how on sabbatical from work right
this is not what i ordered
can anything go right in my life
first my marriage falls apart and then
and then you lose your apartment
and then you lose your job
and then your ex wife gets married so fast
i believe that the sun has set on our day in the sun
you are a very sweet person ross umm unfortunately i do not think i can take another second of you whining
let let me make sure hearing this right you are ending this with me because too whiney
so you are saying become so whiney that i annoy you janice
well i guess that is two out of three joey
i just wanted to tell you something before you heard it from someone else and i hope this is not too weird but uh i had uh a thing with janice
what you are you are not mad
well because yknow there are certain rules about this kind of stuff
you do not uh you do not fool around with your uh friends ex girlfriends or possible girlfriends or girls they are related to
but you know what gonna do
because that is what friends do
they forgive their friends when they do everything you just said all on the list there
well but i want you to remember that i forgave you
i also want you to remember that i let you live here rent free
and i want you to remember that i gave you twenty seven dollars
now if you cannot remember that i think we should write it down let us write it down
